sourcesContent:
/** * This page will contain some of the deployed applications that I have worked on during the time */ import React from "react"; function Project(props) { return (
{props.projects.map((project) => (

{project.title}

{project.description}

Languages: {project.languages}
NPM Packages: {project.packages}
GitHub Repository!
Deployed Application!
))}
); } export default Project;
